title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.43 - Bed complement (beds available)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.43 - Bed complement (beds available)

State Regulations

The total number of accommodations which are available
(those set up and staffed for use). This figure should exclude the newborn
nursery bassinets, beds in rooms intended for induction, recovery, labor, emergency, diagnostic and treatment purposes, and beds in such nonadaptable
areas as corridors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
